sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Update Contact Information-1">ff863cb6db0f1300f72fe04a489619b0</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:0496b0f6db0f1300f72fe04a489619e8</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Validate Mobile Phone Number</name><order>600</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Validate Mobile Phone Number to the format: ### ###-####
 * A user might type without () for the AREA code, and formatted typed phone number in (###) ###-####.
 * http://jira.im.gov.bc.ca/browse/SB-155
 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO
 * History
 * Updated by Munhwan Gim on 6 June 2018: Initial implementation
 **/
function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '' || oldValue == newValue) {
		return;
	}

    var formControlName = 'u_mobile_phone';	
	var invalidMsg = 'Please enter 10 digit phone number';
	var phonenoPattern = /^\(?([0-9]{3})\)?[-. ]?([0-9]{3})[-. ]?([0-9]{4})$/;
	
	newValue = newValue.replace(/[^0-9]/g, '');
	var digits = newValue.length;
	if (newValue.match(phonenoPattern))
	{
		var code = '';

		var area = newValue.substring(0, 3);
		var prefix = newValue.substring(3, 6);
		var line = newValue.substring(6);
		g_form.setValue(formControlName, '(' + area + ') ' + prefix + '-' + line);
		g_form.hideFieldMsg(formControlName);	 
	}	
	else
	{
		g_form.setValue(formControlName, oldValue);
		g_form.showFieldMsg(formControlName, invalidMsg, "error");
		return false;
	}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-05 18:35:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1896f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a4896194b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Mobile Phone Number</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_1896f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a4896194b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>James.Jose</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-05 18:35:04</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Update Contact Information-1">ff863cb6db0f1300f72fe04a489619b0</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:4c96b0f6db0f1300f72fe04a489619bd</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Validate Pager</name><order>800</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Validate Pager to the format: ### ###-####
 * A user might type without () for the AREA code, and formatted typed phone number in (###) ###-####.
 * http://jira.im.gov.bc.ca/browse/SB-155
 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO
 * History
 * Updated by Munhwan Gim on 6 June 2018: Initial implementation
 **/
function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
		
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}
	
    var formControlName = 'u_pager';	
	var invalidMsg = 'Please enter 10 digit phone number';
	var phonenoPattern = /^\(?([0-9]{3})\)?[-. ]?([0-9]{3})[-. ]?([0-9]{4})$/;
	
	newValue = newValue.replace(/[^0-9]/g, '');
	var digits = newValue.length;
	if (newValue.match(phonenoPattern))
	{
		var code = '';

		var area = newValue.substring(0, 3);
		var prefix = newValue.substring(3, 6);
		var line = newValue.substring(6);
		g_form.setValue(formControlName, '(' + area + ') ' + prefix + '-' + line);
		g_form.hideFieldMsg(formControlName);	 
	}	
	else
	{
		g_form.setValue(formControlName, oldValue);
		g_form.showFieldMsg(formControlName, invalidMsg, "error");
		return false;
	}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-05 18:35:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9c96f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a48961956</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Pager</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_9c96f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a48961956</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>James.Jose</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-05 18:35:04</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Update Contact Information-1">ff863cb6db0f1300f72fe04a489619b0</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:0896b0f6db0f1300f72fe04a489619a8</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Validate Fax Number</name><order>700</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Validate Fax Number to the format: ### ###-####
 * A user might type without () for the AREA code, and formatted typed phone number in (###) ###-####.
 * http://jira.im.gov.bc.ca/browse/SB-155
 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO
 * History
 * Updated by Munhwan Gim on 6 June 2018: Initial implementation
 **/
function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
		
	if (isLoading || newValue == '' || oldValue == newValue) {
		return;
	}
    	
    var formControlName = 'u_fax_number';	
	var invalidMsg = 'Please enter 10 digit phone number';
	var phonenoPattern = /^\(?([0-9]{3})\)?[-. ]?([0-9]{3})[-. ]?([0-9]{4})$/;
	
	newValue = newValue.replace(/[^0-9]/g, '');
	var digits = newValue.length;
	if (newValue.match(phonenoPattern))
	{
		var code = '';

		var area = newValue.substring(0, 3);
		var prefix = newValue.substring(3, 6);
		var line = newValue.substring(6);
		g_form.setValue(formControlName, '(' + area + ') ' + prefix + '-' + line);
		g_form.hideFieldMsg(formControlName);	 
	}	
	else
	{
		g_form.setValue(formControlName, oldValue);
		g_form.showFieldMsg(formControlName, invalidMsg, "error");
		return false;
	}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-05 18:35:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d896f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a48961959</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Fax Number</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_d896f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a48961959</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>James.Jose</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-05 18:35:04</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Update Contact Information-1">ff863cb6db0f1300f72fe04a489619b0</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:4096b0f6db0f1300f72fe04a489619d8</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Postalcoder per Selected Address</name><order>300</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Set Postalcode
 *
 * http://jira.im.gov.bc.ca/browse/SB-155
 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO
 * History
 * Updated by Munhwan Gim on 11 June 2018: Initial implementation
 **/
function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {

   if (isLoading || newValue == '' || newValue == oldValue) {
      return;
   }
   	
   var postalCodeCtrlName = 'u_postal_code';
   var _addressTableName = 'x_215090_ocio_madr_ocio_master_address_list_custom_table';
   var streetSelected = newValue;
	
   g_form.clearValue(postalCodeCtrlName);

	// Execute Script Include to set the Street Options
	var ga = new GlideAjax('OCIOMasterAddressList');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getPostalcodeByStreet');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_streetVal', streetSelected);
	ga.addParam('sysparm_addressTable', _addressTableName);
	ga.getXMLAnswer(callback);
	
	function callback(answer) {
	
		if (answer) {
			var postalCode = answer;
			g_form.setValue(postalCodeCtrlName, postalCode);
		}
	}   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-05 18:35:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9896f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a4896196b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Postalcoder per Selected Address</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_9896f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a4896196b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>James.Jose</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-05 18:35:04</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>1</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Update Contact Information-1">ff863cb6db0f1300f72fe04a489619b0</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:1496f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a48961927</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Populate Street List</name><order>200</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Populate the cascaded Street Options against the selected City
 *
 * http://jira.im.gov.bc.ca/browse/SB-155
 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO
 * History
 * Updated by Munhwan Gim on 11 June 2018: Initial implementation
 **/
function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	
	//debugger;
	//alert('1. onChange - Populate Street List Catalog Client SCripts -- just Return. old City: (' + oldValue + ') -- new Value: (' +newValue+')');
	
   if (isLoading || newValue == '' || newValue == oldValue) {
      return;
   }
   	//alert('2. onChange - Populate Street List Catalog Client SCripts --- Re populated DDL');
   // ToDo.. Is there any better way to get the custom table name?
   var addressCtrlName = 'u_address';
   var postalCodeCtrlName = 'u_postal_code';
   var _addressTableName = 'x_215090_ocio_madr_ocio_master_address_list_custom_table';
   var citySelected = newValue;
	
   // Clear Street and Postal code
	if (newValue !== oldValue) {
		g_form.clearValue(postalCodeCtrlName);
		g_form.clearOptions(addressCtrlName);
	}

	//alert(">>>> DEBUG:: Populate Street List: citySelected: (" + citySelected +")"); 
	
	// Execute Script Include to set the Street Options
	var ga = new GlideAjax('OCIOMasterAddressList');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getStreets');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_cityVal', citySelected);
	ga.addParam('sysparm_addressTable', _addressTableName);
	ga.getXMLAnswer(streetCallback);
	
	function streetCallback(answer) {
				
		if (answer) {
			
			//alert(">>>> DEBUG:: Populate Street List: " + answer);
			// Set up Street Datasource
			var objList = JSON.parse(answer);
			var selected = 0;
			
			for (var i = 0; i < objList.length; i++ ) {
				var obj = objList[i];
				g_form.addOption(addressCtrlName, obj.value, obj.label);
				if (obj.selected) {
					selected = i;
				}
			}
			//g_form.setValue(addressCtrlName, objList[selected].value, objList[selected].label);
		}
	}
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-05 18:35:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d896f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a4896194e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate Street List</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_d896f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a4896194e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>James.Jose</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-05 18:35:04</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Update Contact Information (GAL)">ff863cb6db0f1300f72fe04a489619b0</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Default Fields From Current User</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Set Default values using the current logged-In User
 * http://jira.im.gov.bc.ca/browse/SB-155
 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO
 * History
 * Updated by Munhwan Gim on 7 June 2018: Initial implementation
 **/
function onLoad() {
   
	var userID = g_user.userID;
	var userName = g_user.userName;	
	var itemID = g_form.getUniqueValue();	
	
	var ga = new GlideAjax('OCIO_SR_HelperUtils');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'ajaxFtn_getUserItemById');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_src_sysid', userID);
	ga.addParam('sysparm_item_sysid', itemID);
	/*ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'ajaxFtn_getUserById');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_src_sysid', userID);*/
	
	ga.getXMLAnswer(cbFtn);
		
	function cbFtn(answer) {
		
		if (answer) {
			
			var retObj = JSON.parse(answer);
			
			g_form.setValue('u_organization', retObj.company, retObj.company);
			g_form.setValue('u_title', retObj.title, retObj.title);  
			
			// Special care!
			g_form.setValue('u_city',  retObj.city, retObj.city); 
			g_form.setValue('u_address', retObj.street, retObj.street); 
			g_form.setValue('u_postal_code', retObj.zip, retObj.zip);
			g_form.setValue('u_business_phone', retObj.phone, retObj.phone);
			g_form.setValue('u_mobile_phone', retObj.mobile_phone, retObj.mobile_phone);
			g_form.setValue('u_department', retObj.u_ad_department, retObj.u_ad_department);
			g_form.setValue('u_office', retObj.u_delivery_office, retObj.u_delivery_office);

			// Not there yet on sys_user table
			g_form.setValue('u_assistant', retObj.u_assitant, retObj.u_assitant);
			g_form.setValue('u_fax_number', retObj.u_fax, retObj.u_fax);
			g_form.setValue('u_pager', retObj.u_pager, retObj.u_pager); 
			
			var sc_item_request_display_name = retObj.sc_cat_item_name + ' for ' + retObj.username;
			//var sc_item_request_display_name = 'Update Contact Information (GAL) for '+ retObj.username;
			g_form.setValue('sc_item_request_display_name', sc_item_request_display_name, sc_item_request_display_name);			
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-05 18:35:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9496f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a48961951</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Default Fields From Current User</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_9496f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a48961951</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>James.Jose</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-01 22:05:51</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Update Contact Information (GAL)">ff863cb6db0f1300f72fe04a489619b0</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:d896f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a48961921</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Update Form by Requested For</name><order>400</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '' || oldValue == newValue) {
      return;
   }
		
	var itemID = g_form.getUniqueValue();	
	
	var ga = new GlideAjax('OCIO_SR_HelperUtils');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'ajaxFtn_getUserItemById');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_src_sysid', newValue);
	ga.addParam('sysparm_item_sysid', itemID);
	/*ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'ajaxFtn_getUserById');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_src_sysid',  newValue);*/
	ga.getXMLAnswer(cbFtn);
		
	function cbFtn(answer) {
				
		if (answer) {	
			var retObj = JSON.parse(answer);
			
			g_form.setValue('u_organization', retObj.company, retObj.company);
			g_form.setValue('u_title', retObj.title, retObj.title);  
			
			// Special care!
			g_form.setValue('u_city',  retObj.city, retObj.city);
			g_form.setValue('u_address', retObj.street, retObj.street);
			g_form.setValue('u_postal_code', retObj.zip, retObj.zip);
			g_form.setValue('u_business_phone', retObj.phone, retObj.phone);
			g_form.setValue('u_mobile_phone', retObj.mobile_phone, retObj.mobile_phone);
			g_form.setValue('u_department', retObj.u_ad_department, retObj.u_ad_department);
			g_form.setValue('u_office', retObj.u_delivery_office, retObj.u_delivery_office);

			// Not there yet on sys_user table
			g_form.setValue('u_assistant', retObj.u_assitant, retObj.u_assitant);
			g_form.setValue('u_fax_number', retObj.u_fax, retObj.u_fax);
			g_form.setValue('u_pager', retObj.u_pager, retObj.u_pager); 
				
			
			var sc_item_request_display_name = retObj.sc_cat_item_name + ' for ' + retObj.username;
			//var sc_item_request_display_name ='Update Contact Information (GAL) for ' + retObj.username;
			g_form.setValue('sc_item_request_display_name', sc_item_request_display_name, sc_item_request_display_name);
			
 		}
	}	
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-05 18:35:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5c96f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a48961968</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Form by Requested For</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_5c96f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a48961968</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>James.Jose</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-01 22:06:44</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_d096f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a48961954
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Update Contact Information-1">ff863cb6db0f1300f72fe04a489619b0</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:4c96b0f6db0f1300f72fe04a489619ad</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Validate Biz Phone With Extension</name><order>500</order><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Validate Business Number to the format: ### ###-#### ext. ###
 * A user might type without () for the AREA code, and formatted typed phone number in (###) ###-#### ext. ###.
 * http://jira.im.gov.bc.ca/browse/SB-155
 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO
 * History
 * Updated by Munhwan Gim on 6 June 2018: Initial implementation
 **/
function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '' || oldValue == newValue) {
		return;
	}

    var formControlName = 'u_business_phone';	
	var invalidMsg = 'Please enter 10 digit phone number followed by "ext." and 3 or 4 digit extension.';
		
   // Allows formats of ### ###-#### OR ### ###-#### ext ####
   var phonenoPattern = /^\(?([0-9]{3})\)?[-. ]?([0-9]{3})[-. ]?([0-9]{4})[-.]?(ext)?([0-9]{3,4})?$/;
	
	newValue = newValue.replace(/[^0-9]/g, '');
	var digits = newValue.length;
	if (newValue.match(phonenoPattern))
	{
		var code = '';
        
		var area = newValue.substring(0, 3);
		var prefix = newValue.substring(3, 6);
		var line = newValue.substring(6, 10);
		var extNumber = newValue.substring(10, newValue.length-1);
		if (newValue.length == 10){
			g_form.setValue(formControlName, '(' + area + ') ' + prefix + '-' + line);
		} else {
			g_form.setValue(formControlName, '(' + area + ') ' + prefix + '-' + line + ' ext. ' + extNumber);
		}
		g_form.hideFieldMsg(formControlName);	 
	}	
	else
	{
		g_form.setValue(formControlName, oldValue);
		g_form.showFieldMsg(formControlName, invalidMsg, "error");
		return false;
	}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-05 18:35:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d096f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a48961954</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Biz Phone With Extension</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_d096f0f6db0f1300f72fe04a48961954</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>James.Jose</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-05 18:35:04</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
